meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the May 15, 2024 City Council Meeting
Consideration of appointments to boards and commissions
agenda_items.description: Evaluation and duties of board and commission members (List of nominees is available in the City Secretary's Office)

agenda_items.title: Casting of lots to identify the recommended vendor
agenda_items.description: Resulting from tie bids between Marco Holdings I, LLC dba Bumper to Bumper and Southwest International Truck, Inc. on lines 9-1, 9-2, and 15-1 in response to bid BG24-00023860 for a three-year master agreement for the purchase of aftermarket automotive parts for the use of the City’s fleet

agenda_items.title: Discussion of Recommended Amendments to the 2024 Charter Review Commission’s Final Report
Consideration of the 2025 Federal Legislative Priorities
